issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Window events - color is different for the messages fired by the user than the color of the messages fired automatically.

This is not regression since the issue occurs on 3.1.0 GA as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to KS> BASE UI>Windows events
2. Fire each event as specified.
3. Observe the color of the messages.

Actual:
The color of the messages change. But the color of the messages related to the events like focus fired etc remains same.

Expected:
The color of messages related to all fired events should be same.
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink - Window events - color is different for the messages fired by the user than the color of the messages fired automatically.
fields.environment:
SDK:3.1.2.v20130725180746
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.2.201307171817
OS: OSX 10.7.5
Device:Google nexus 7 (v 4.2.1)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
